author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two youth were killed when their two-wheeler was hit by a train on Tuesday.

M. Madhaiyan (21) of Kannapadi in Kadayampatti took M. Ramakrishnan (24) of the same village to a hospital in his motorcycle and was returning home. The gates were closed at the level crossing near Danishpet. Madhaiyan who was riding the motorcycle passed through the space available near the closed gate and crossed the first track in which Chennai to Salem train passed through. He failed to notice the Tirupathi Express coming in the opposite direction in the second track and was hit by it.
title: Two killed
